column5: Hows the fishin up on nip so far this year,I was up last weekend around the south river area ,we killed them,going back friday morning cant wait love the hardwater brothers...........Dave

Type Nipissing into the search box in the top right and you will get some info.   Welcome to the board Dave. How about a little introduction of yourself? Then start asking questions.....you will get better answers I guarantee it.
